title: Aerial.Destruction.Frontline.Assault.Repack
description:
Aerial.Destruction.Frontline.Assault.Repack

Genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy
Developer: Devdan Games 
Publisher: Devdan Games


About This Game

Aerial Destruction is an aerial shooter set during battles between militaries and armed groups of bio-engineered mutants !

3 helicopters to play, easy to fly with cockpit and behind view, with their own specific armaments, tactics, gameplay and upgradable using credits points to achieve maximum destruction !

A complete set of 7 missions with objectives ranging from defending military outposts for as long as possible, destroying enemy convoys, storming enemy positions, supporting allied troops in assaulting enemy bases, etc...

15 achievements to unlock, with support of Steam trading cards and Steam cloud to keep all progress available on any computer. Also playable with Xbox-like gamepads and in Ultra HD (4K).


System Requirements

Minimum:
OS: Windows XP or Windows 7
Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 2 GB available space

How to install

After download is done:
- open Aerial.Destruction.Frontline.Assault.Repack(executable file)
- choose location ,
- click install ,
- wait until is done 
- play game from desktop shortcut 
or Run ...UDK.exe from the game install path
